name: TopTechNews
0:
”Alexa, open TTN”
”Alexa, ask TTN to read AI and Robotics news”
”Alexa, ask TTN to read gaming news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. t. n.
des:
Top Tech News (TTN) brings you the latest technology news from across the globe. 

To get started, just say, “Alexa, open TTN’.

We curate the news for you so that you get only what’s important and not noise. You can listen to the breaking news and latest headlines from a host of specially curated categories:

- Mobile
- AI and Robotics
- Computer
- Gaming

After TTN starts, to listen to a specific category, simply say the category name like “Mobile”, “AI and Robotics”, “Computer”, “Gaming” or "News".

To listen to any headline in detail, simply say the category name along with the headline number. For example, if you want to listen to the news in detail for headline number 1 in the mobile category, simply say “Mobile Headline 1”. TTN will do a complete newscast for you for that specific headline.

At any point of time if you need any help, simply say “Help”.

Stay updated all the time, every time with Top Tech News!
